result.execSummary:
The defendant Dustin L Julseth was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: To be served in WPS pursuant to sec. 973.03(2).
$67 VW surcharge to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  $200 DNA surcharge and court costs remitted.
No objection, order to be signed.

-DOC can take 25% of any and all funds in Defendant's prisoner account including but not limited to 25% of gifts, wages or other funds.
-DNA on file

Copy of minutes from PLEAS Hrg on 10/12/22 sent electronically to DCJ.

11:31 AM Defendant Dustin L Julseth appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Allegra L Berry in court for Dustin L Julseth.  ADA Timothy Robert Verhoff in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count 1.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 

On Motion of the State, the Court DRI Count #Count 2 and Repeater on Count 1

Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT #1 
The Court sentences Defendant to:
-Serve 5 months in Dane County Jail - Deemed Served

-Days credit for time served: 132 days credit 
-Days credit to jail: 132 days credit

COURT COSTS:
Ct #1
- All CC and DNA surcharge waived. V/W surcharge due w/in 60 days. Payment plan approved

-Restitution: State has filed Order. No Objection to Court signing Order.

-DOC can take 25% of any and all funds in Defendant's prisoner account including but not limited to 25% of gifts, wagers or other funds.

-DNA on file

-Defendant advised of post-conviction rights

Abby H.

-Served 5 months in the Dane County Jail, to be served in the WSP - Abby H.

Zoom

01:33 PM Defendant in court, in custody from Stanley Correctional via Zoom with Attorney Jacob A Idlas.  Carl Jacob Lazarus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 09:00 am.
